page.title: 14AGRICULTURE IN TIBBERTON
page.content: {FARMING}-The farmer owns 556 acres of farmland;41 of winter barley,17 of fodder beet,270 of wheat,20 of oats, 189 used for cattle, 17 for corn.The farmer has 140 cattle which produce milk,which goes to the Milk Marketing Board. {EMPLOYMENT}-6 people work on the farm,4 drive tractors,1 works in the workshop,1 works in the fields with the cattle.They work 12 hours in the day.The farmer works from dawn to dusk. {SCIENCE IN FARMING}-The farmer believes chemicals are essential.If there were none farming would be impossible because of bugs and diseases. {HISTORY}-This farm is Saxon,it was mentioned in the previous Domesday book,there have been several farms where the farm is today.
